text: Lee Hyun Jae (born December 20, 1929) is a former South Korean politician. He served from March to December 1988 as the twentieth prime minister of South Korea.Yahu! Baekgwasajeon 야후! 백과사전 [Yahoo! Encyclopedia], s.v. "Lee Hyeon-jae" 이현재, http://kr.dictionary.search.yahoo.com/search/dictionaryp?subtype=enc&pk;=17252300&field;=id&p;=%EC%9D%B4%ED%98%84%EC%9E%AC Lee is the chairman of the Ho-Am Prize Committee and an advisor of the Korean Association for Cultural Economics as of 2017. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Lee Hyun-jae
